import React from 'react' import { useDispatch } from 'react-redux' import { Link } from 'react-router-dom' import { startLoginEmailPassword } from '../../actions/auth' import { useForm } from '../../hooks/useForm' export const LoginScreen = () => { const dispatch = useDispatch(); const [value, handleInputChange] = useForm({ email:'david@gmail.com', password: '1234' }) const {email, password} = value; const handleLogin = (e) => { e.preventDefault(); console.log(email, password); dispatch( startLoginEmailPassword(email,password) ); } return ( <>

Login

Login with social networks

Sign in with google

Create new account
) }
